message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This unique item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and I am excited to offer it to you at a special price. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $950,000. I believe this offer presents an excellent chance for both of us to benefit from this transaction. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.
